Constructors

constructor

  • new SlotComposer(options: SlotComposerOptions): SlotComposer
    • Defined in runtime/slot-composer.ts:36

    |options| must contain:

    • modalityName: the UI modality the slot-composer renders to (for example: dom).
    • modalityHandler: the handler for UI modality the slot-composer renders to.
    • rootContainer: the top level container to be used for slots. and may contain:
    • containerKind: the type of container wrapping each slot-context's container (for example, div).

    Parameters

    • options: SlotComposerOptions

    Returns SlotComposer
